commitResults.messageTitle: a)Changed the name to Pepsi b)Included Greeting line and Goodby line
c)removed concat and used a text block instead for the printing of "PEPSI"

-made longline a global variable and added a "\n" at the back so that it will move down one line when outputting the switch cases line print ling -inported util.Scanner so that the program will able to take in inputs from the user -created a while loop to run infinitely and created 2 variables one is the input which stores the users input and a boolean variable keepGoing which depneding on its value can break out of the while loop or continue asking for input -made a boolean function "repeat" which returns false to main if the user inputs "bye" and true otherwise. Used a if statement as there is only two conditions as of now

-added 2 global variables, one is a String array which can take in and store inputs. Another is a int which tracks which position needs to be filled next. -Changed the if else statement in the boolean repeat function into a switch case statemen, kept the parameters for to.Lower. Put in a bye case which outputs a goodbye speech and for the list case implemented a for loop that iterates throuhg the catalogue and prints out the values stored inside each index. If the next value is NULL means the end of the array has been reached and the loop will exit and return back to the main function -added a default case which does not hit either of the specific case scenarios above and this defualt case just adds the input into the catalogue into the fill position and updates the fill position

-within the while loop in main after takin the users input, the input is broken down into two parts using .split("\\s+"), byu doing so we are not only able to take into account one spacing, but even if we input mark     1 with multiple spacings in between we are still able to obtain mark as parts[0] amd 1 as part[1[] -then i go into a if else if statement whereby if the length of parts arrray is only 1 then i enter one if statement but if the length of parts array euqla 2 i enter the if statement where i converted parts[1] into an int -renanmed the repeat method to actionables and overloaded it so that if it takes in one string and one int it will only have the mark and unmark functions within that method

-realised that the former if else if statement within the while loop in the main method had a flaw whereby if i input a string with a space it will enter the actionalbles function with 2 parameters instead of the actionables with one. Corrected it by specifying that only if the first input from the user is mark or unmark then it will enter the method to mark or unmark the item in the list else the input will be added into the list instead from the actionable method with one parameter

-added some cases to prevent crashing like checking if the user input spaces only or nothing at all will return a line and prompt the user again -added some cases for mark/unmark if the user only inputs mark with no number after it will remind the user to input a number and if the user inputs mark/unmark x where x is not a number but a letter it will also prompt the user to input a number again

-Added a Marker class instead of the multiuple functions that i have created for marking -Split each action into its own function for better readability and give main only 2 function calls -Ensureed that the coding standard is matched
-Added the task class as well as the subclasses Deadline, Todo, Event.
-Created a ACtions package and put all class actions into that package
-created a exceptions package and moved all errors to that exceptions package
